channel.title: Eternity Union Revolution (Hamachi)
channel.description:
Hey Guys Check Out My New Server Called Eternity Union Revolution RSPS! It's Hamachi For Now =P
It Has Loads Of Features And Alot To Add And Fix We Have 16 Players Atm
Some Features Below: - Titles in-game depending on what donator you are (the higher donator you are the better titles you have/get)! - 100% working skillcapes - 100% working korasi,d claws, and ags spec! - 100% working Jad minigame (only jad himself) - Donator titles available! - Working pest control with awesome rewards from xp rewards to void set rewards! - 2300xp per hit! - Working donator zone with privileges such as shops IN the zone, automatic 25 GWD kills, and thieving privileges (thieving in donor zone stalls are more worth than at home) - ALL bosses working 100% such as corporal beast, nomad, kbd, kalphite queen, barrelchest, tormented demons, dagganoth kings, giant mole... we also have custom bosses like skeleton horror, bal'lak the pummeller, pheonix, rammernaut (drops korasi), avatars in wild, ballance elemental and so much more!!! All these bosses drop something either a good spec weapon, valuable armour, and/or rare item in-game! - Working spirit shields with original stats and effects! - Working Godsword set from bandos/zamorak/saradomin/ and armadyl godswords, spec works perfectly fine! - Chaotics tradable! - Duel Arena is 100% working! (Staking is available) - Warriors guild working 100%! (Get defenders here from bronze to dragon!) - Barrows working! - Player shops available, creating your own shop or buying from another player's shop! - Construction, dungeoneering, and summoning working 100% ! and the rest of the skills ALSO working! - Pking teleports such as castle in wild (lv14), mage bank, green dragons (lv10), and last but not least edgeville! - Skill teleport working and perfect for those who wish to skill all day! - Agility and Hunter teleport are together because you can do them both in this area! - SOME customs such as Death cape and Raptor armour (looks like bandos armour but better) - Ordinary donator, epic donator, and elite donator ranks have been added and working 100% in the yell and public chats In-game! - :layers are working 100%, it shows Name, level in-game, rank/rights, and kills/deaths! - NEX armours working 100% with original stats! (Torva, Pernix, and Virtus) - Dungeoneering weapons and armours working 100% ingame such as full primal, chaotics, etc...! - PVP Armours such as vesta, statius, morrigans, and zuriels!
BE SURE TO CHECK IT OUT! http://eternityunion.forumstopic.com/ FORUMS Go to Download Section and Download Client Or Use Web Client You Can Get It In New's And Announcements Really Good And Active Staff! -Loco (Owner, Coder, Hoster, Founder)

item.title: Eternity Union Revolution (Hamachi)
item.dc:creator: @Darnell_Geroux Darnell Geroux
item.description:
@Darnell_Geroux wrote:

Hey Guys Check Out My New Server Called Eternity Union Revolution RSPS!
It’s Hamachi For Now =P

It Has Loads Of Features And Alot To Add And Fix We Have 16 Players Atm

Some Features Below:

  • Titles in-game depending on what donator you are (the higher donator you are the better titles you have/get)!
  • 100% working skillcapes
  • 100% working korasi,d claws, and ags spec!
  • 100% working Jad minigame (only jad himself)
  • Donator titles available!
  • Working pest control with awesome rewards from xp rewards to void set rewards!
  • 2300xp per hit!
  • Working donator zone with privileges such as shops IN the zone, automatic 25 GWD kills, and thieving privileges (thieving in donor zone stalls are more worth than at home)
  • ALL bosses working 100% such as corporal beast, nomad, kbd, kalphite queen, barrelchest, tormented demons, dagganoth kings, giant mole… we also have custom bosses like skeleton horror, bal’lak the pummeller, pheonix, rammernaut (drops korasi), avatars in wild, ballance elemental and so much more!!! All these bosses drop something either a good spec weapon, valuable armour, and/or rare item in-game!
  • Working spirit shields with original stats and effects!
  • Working Godsword set from bandos/zamorak/saradomin/ and armadyl godswords, spec works perfectly fine!
  • Chaotics tradable!
  • Duel Arena is 100% working! (Staking is available)
  • Warriors guild working 100%! (Get defenders here from bronze to dragon!)
  • Barrows working!
  • Player shops available, creating your own shop or buying from another player’s shop!
  • Construction, dungeoneering, and summoning working 100% ! and the rest of the skills ALSO working!
  • Pking teleports such as castle in wild (lv14), mage bank, green dragons (lv10), and last but not least edgeville!
  • Skill teleport working and perfect for those who wish to skill all day!
  • Agility and Hunter teleport are together because you can do them both in this area!
  • SOME customs such as Death cape and Raptor armour (looks like bandos armour but better)
  • Ordinary donator, epic donator, and elite donator ranks have been added and working 100% in the yell and public chats In-game!
  • :layers are working 100%, it shows Name, level in-game, rank/rights, and kills/deaths!
  • NEX armours working 100% with original stats! (Torva, Pernix, and Virtus)
  • Dungeoneering weapons and armours working 100% ingame such as full primal, chaotics, etc…!
  • PVP Armours such as vesta, statius, morrigans, and zuriels!

BE SURE TO CHECK IT OUT!
